title: What is the importance of playing guitar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Importance of Playing Guitar are : Feel Serious Pleasure of playing music Wave Away Stress Play guitar to strengthen your hands and wrists. Sharpen Your Mind Play guitar to improve creativity. Toughen Your Ticker Build More Brainpower Play guitar to improve your coordination and ability to handle multiple tasks. Play guitar to lose weight. Play guitar to work on your time management skills. Play guitar to improve your math and English skills.

I grew up on a farm in the middle of nowhere Kansas in the 60’s. I was 6 of 8 kids. My parents were from the depression and were practical. Neither they or none of my siblings were musical , but one grandparent from each side were. When I was 7 (1967) we visited neighbors, whose daughter played here comes the sun. I remember exactly where I was standing. I said to myself that is what I want to do. That was 16 guitars ago!!

Its a bit of a strange question. To me its not about the importance of playing the guitar, its about the love of playing and the joy it gives me. I guess you could say that playing or practicing an intsrument shows you have dedication, persistance and some skill, and it does strengthen the fingers. http://leftiesguitars.us/
